subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping
lead_paragraph: With last year's winner, Alberto Contador, and third-place finisher, Levi Leipheimer, out of this year's Tour de France, Cadel Evans is the favorite to ride off wearing the yellow jersey.
snippet: With last year's winner, Alberto Contador, and third-place finisher, Levi Leipheimer, out of this year's Tour de France, Cadel Evans is the favorite to ride off wearing the yellow jersey.
